text: Clemson University The pronunciation of Clemson varies. The consonant written ⟨s⟩ may be either or , in which case many insert a between the two syllables. Because of the pin–pen merger, many locals use as the first vowel. is a public university in Clemson, South Carolina. Clemson's athletics teams are called the Tigers. ==References== * Category:Atlantic Coast Conference Category:Colleges and universities in South Carolina Category:1889 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in South Carolina
title: Clemson University
